encyclopedia.content: eccentricity 离心率 椭圆（行星的公转轨道）的离心率即是指椭圆上点到焦点的距离与到准线的距离的比值。公式： 离心率=(ra-rp)/(ra+rp)，ra指远日点距离，rp指近日点距离。

entry.def: Eccentricity is unusual behaviour that other people consider strange.

example.ex: He was known as Mad Shelley partly because of his eccentricity and partly because of his violent temper...
example.tran: 大家都叫他“疯子谢利”，部分因为他的古怪，部分因为他火爆的脾气。

example.ex: She is unusual to the point of eccentricity.
example.tran: 她特立独行到了古怪的地步。

entry.def: Eccentricities are ways of behaving that people think are strange, or habits or opinions that are different from those of most people.

example.tran: 我们每个人都有自己的怪癖。
英国人生活中的种种怪癖

means.word_mean: 2. (geometry) a ratio describing the shape of a conic section; the ratio of the distance between the foci to the length of the major axis;

sentences.sentence: "a circle is an ellipse with zero eccentricity"

means.word_mean: 3. a circularity that has a different center or deviates from a circular path
